definition: earnest and conscientious activity intended to do or accomplish something, put on a garment in order to see whether it fits and looks nice
details:
noun
- earnest and conscientious activity intended to do or accomplish something
= synonyms: effort
verb
- put on a garment in order to see whether it fits and looks nice
= synonyms: try on
- melt (fat or lard) in order to separate out impurities
= example: melt (fat or lard) in order to separate out impurities
= synonyms: render
- take a sample of
= synonyms: taste, sample, try out
- test the limits of
= example: test the limits of
= synonyms: strain
- give pain or trouble to
- examine or hear (evidence or a case) by judicial process
= synonyms: hear
- put on trial or hear a case and sit as the judge at the trial of
= synonyms: judge, adjudicate
- make an effort or attempt
= synonyms: attempt
- put to the test, as for its quality, or give experimental use to
= synonyms: test
